thumb.name: Best Mom
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou%26#146;re the best%3Cbr%3EMom%3Cbr%3Ea kid could%3Cbr%3Eever have.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHope your birthday%26#146;s%3Cbr%3Ethe best. too!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWith Love%3Cbr%3Efrom Cassie%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: For Dad from His Kids
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor Dad%3Cbr%3Efrom His Kids%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETimes we spend with Dadare times filled with laughter and love.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EOur favorite times with you%3Cbr%3Ehave always been%3Cbr%3Ethe ones we spent%3Cbr%3Eas a family. Dad.%3Cbr%3Eand that's just one%3Cbr%3Eof the many reasons%3Cbr%3Ethis birthday wish is filled%3Cbr%3Ewith so much love.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday%3Cbr%3Efrom Jamie and Dave

thumb.name: Perfect Sister?
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ELaura.%3Cbr%3Eyou're everything I ever%3Cbr%3Ecould have asked for%3Cbr%3Ein a Sister...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...plus a few things%3Cbr%3EI wouldn't have asked for. too.%3Cbr%3Ebut what the heck.%3Cbr%3Enobody's perfect!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday

thumb.name: A Brother's Many Roles
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJustin:%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFriend%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAdvisor%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETeaser%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EEntertainer%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESometimes Hero%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday%3Cbr%3Eto a brother%3Cbr%3Ewho means%3Cbr%3Eso many %3Cbr%3Edifferent things%3Cbr%3Eto me.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Birthday Girl
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor a Special Daughter%3Cbr%3ENamed Emily%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWho has the prettiest little%3Cbr%3Ebirthday smile%3Cbr%3Ein all the world today?%3Cbr%3EWho%26#146;s getting to be%3Cbr%3Esuch a big girl?%3Cbr%3EWho couldn%26#146;t be sweeter%3Cbr%3Eor more loved?%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou %26#151; %3Cbr%3Ethat%26#146;s who.%3Cbr%3EBirthday Girl!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Our Bizarre Family
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's nice to be related to you. Aaron.%3Cbr%3Ebecause we have%3Cbr%3Eso much in common...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...beginning with%3Cbr%3Eour bizarre family.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: You're Loved a Lot
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor You.%3Cbr%3EJim.%3Cbr%3EWith Love%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThough you're a very special son%3Cbr%3EWith fine and thoughtful ways.%3Cbr%3ESomehow it's all too seldom%3Cbr%3EThat you get your share of praise...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThat's why it's so important.%3Cbr%3EWhen your special day is here.%3Cbr%3ETo remind you%3Cbr%3Ethat you're loved a lot%3Cbr%3EAnd wished the best all year.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday
